name: useTsInterfaceForm

type.rawType: <T extends unknown>(tsInterface: Omit<TModel, import("/Users/king/King/operations/tools/types/model-types/build/generics").ShouldNotBeStored>, id?: string | undefined, initialValue?: T | undefined, projectRelativeStorageFilePath?: string | undefined, modelName?: string | undefined) => [form?: JSX.Element | undefined, value?: T | undefined, onChange?: ((value: T) => void) | undefined]

value:
<T extends unknown>(
  /**
   * NB: Don't change this! The amount of hooks depends on this
   */
  tsInterface: Storing<TsInterface>,
  id?: string,
  /**
   * Only works if set on first render
   */
  initialValue?: T,
  /**
   * Tell the form where the model will be stored so the form can render assets correctly
   *
   * If not given, it is tried to be taken from tthe initialValue (will only work if it's a db-model instance with a `.projectRelativePath`)
   */
  projectRelativeStorageFilePath?: string,
  /**
   * must be provided in case of a db model
   */
  modelName?: string
): [
  form?: JSX.Element,
  value?: T | undefined,
  onChange?: (value: T) => void
] => {
  const [realId] = useState(id || `s${String(Math.random())}`);
  const [values, onChange] = useState<[value: T | undefined]>([initialValue]);

  // NB: only the first item matters
  const value = values[0];
  const onChangeValue = (value: T) => onChange([value]);

  // NB: we must have the simplifiedSchema, it's not always indexed
  const simplifiedSchema = tsInterface.type.simplifiedSchema;
  if (!simplifiedSchema) return [];

  const referencableModelData = useReferencableModelData(simplifiedSchema);

  const form = (
    <SimplifiedSchemaForm
      modelName={modelName}
      key={realId}
      id={realId}
      onChange={onChange}
      values={values}
      itemNameOrId={
        (value as AugmentedAnyModelType)?.name ||
        (value as AugmentedAnyModelType)?.id
      }
      parameters={[
        {
          name: "",
          required: true,
          simplifiedSchema,
          isDbModel: true,
        },
      ]}
      projectRelativeStorageFilePath={
        projectRelativeStorageFilePath ||
        (initialValue as AnyModelType)?.projectRelativePath
      }
      referencableModelData={referencableModelData}
    />
  );

  return [form, value, onChangeValue];
}
